name: Pescavitus
movement: swim speed of 60 feet, no land movement
description: Pescavitus is a small celestial creature that thrives underwater, with a slender body adapted for swimming.
memorable: Its Piscine Curse can curse those who reduce it to 0 HP, making them less effective at healing.
goals: To assist allies and protect aquatic environments.
relations: Often associated with other celestial beings and aquatic creatures.
environment: Aquatic environments such as lakes, rivers, and oceans.
strengths: Magical weapon attacks deal additional radiant damage and it has strong utility abilities including healing and curse mechanics.
weaknesses: Cannot move on land, highly reliant on aquatic environments.
attacks: Slam attack deals both bludgeoning and radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Piscine Curse, which curses enemies upon its defeat or if they consume its flesh.
senses: Has darkvision up to 120 feet, enhancing its awareness in underwater environments.
skills: It has basic perception abilities, reflected by a passive Perception of 10.
additional_information: Immortal Nature: Does not require food, drink, or sleep.
Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Healing Touch can restore hit points and remove afflictions.
Air Bubble ability allows shared underwater breathing for multiple creatures.
Loses effectiveness on land due to inability to move.
test_queries: small celestial creature that lives underwater
magical aquatic guardian with a curse
creature that curses those who harm it
powerful underwater ally with healing abilities
